detail: Ginger, curly hair neatly coiffured to reveal a strong, gloomy face. Round hazel eyes, set charmingly within their sockets, watch warmly over the spirits they've sought solace in for so long.Fire has left a mark reaching from the left side of the forehead , running towards the left side of his lips and ending under his right eye leaves a lasting punishment of liberated love.This is the face of Brodie Dallin, a true leader among werewolves. He stands tall above others, despite his delicate frame.There's something bizarre about him, perhaps it's his good looks or perhaps it's simply his suffering. But nonetheless, people tend to worship him, while trying to hide from him.

detail: Chestnut, curly hair slightly covers a long, lively face. Round gray eyes, set delicately within their sockets, watch guardedly over the clan they've defended for so long.Fallen debry left a mark reaching from the bottom of the left cheek , running towards his right nostril and ending on his forehead leaves a bittersweet memory of defended homes.This is the face of Cale Barnfield, a true prodigy among humans. He stands alluringly among others, despite his fragile frame.There's something incomprehensible about him, perhaps it's a feeling of regret or perhaps it's simply his sense of justice. But nonetheless, people tend to take pride in knowing him, while secretly dispising him.

detail: Red, well groomed hair slightly reveals a craggy, warm face. Wide red eyes, set thightly within their sockets, watch loyally over the ships they've protected for so long.A tattoo resembling a lion paw is displayed just below his left eye leaves an intriguing memory of reclaimed lands.This is the face of Hagwin Wildoak, a true master among night elves. He stands tall among others, despite his tough frame.There's something ambiguous about him, perhaps it's his reputation or perhaps it's simply his fortunate past. But nonetheless, people tend to assist him, while trying to please him.
